concept.title: Scenarios to connect WebSphere Application Server and
concept.shortdesc: These scenarios use sample applications to demonstrate the use of connected to . You can set up a copy of the sample installation as described in each of the scenarios. You can use the sample applications that are provided with each scenario to verify your progress through each stage. The scenarios are available in the IBM Product Connectivity Scenarios and Patterns information center.

conbody.p: The first scenario shows you how to connect Java EE applications on to , in order to consume and work with messages from . Starting with an existing installation, this scenario leads you through the key tasks that are required to install and connect . For more information, see Scenario: Connecting WebSphere Application Server to .

The second scenario shows you how to connect mobile devices to Java EE applications on by using the MQTT protocol. Starting with an existing and installation, this scenario leads you through the key tasks that are required to connect a mobile device to . For more information, see Scenario: Adding a mobile application with toWebSphere Application Server.
